bg-color.comment: The background color of the menu icon.

stroke-width.comment: The stroke width of the menu icon.

stroke.comment: The stroke of the menu icon.

transition.comment: The transition on the menu icon that turns the menu icon into an 'X'.

line-one-transform-origin.comment: The transform origin of the 'X' state of the menu for the first menu line. Only needs to be changed if using a custom width and height.

line-three-transform-origin.comment: The transform origin of the 'X' state of the menu for the third menu line. Only needs to be changed if using a custom width and height.
